## Component

Which component are you implementing? (e.g., `core/token_engine.py`)

## Roadmap Reference

Link to the roadmap item in README.md or the architecture doc section.

## Design Approach

Briefly describe how you plan to implement this:

- Key classes and methods
- Data structures
- External dependencies (if any)
- How it integrates with other components

## Test Plan

What tests will you write to prove it works?

- [ ] Unit tests for core logic
- [ ] Edge cases (empty input, invalid data, etc.)
- [ ] Integration with dependent components (if applicable)

## Timeline

When do you expect to have a PR ready?

## Notes

Anything else reviewers should know.
